definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: The study provides scientific basis for exploring aerosol immunity of Hantavirus.
sentences.chinese: 這爲研究漢坦病毒的氣溶膠免疫提供了科學依據。

sentences.english: SEO type was prevalent in hantavirus epidemiology in Qingdao.
sentences.chinese: 總體來看，青島地區流行的漢坦病毒以SEO型爲主。

sentences.english: Objective To construct N-linked glycosylation site mutants of hantavirus.
sentences.chinese: 目的構建漢坦病毒糖基化位點的突變體。

sentences.english: Hemorrhagic fever caused by the virus is hantavirus.
sentences.chinese: 引起出血熱的病毒是漢坦病毒。

sentences.english: Objective To diagnose the infection of Hantaan virus early.
sentences.chinese: 目的早期診斷漢坦病毒感染。

sentences.english: Objective To express the envelope protein G2 of Hantan virus in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的獲得漢坦病毒囊膜蛋白G2體外表達產物。

sentences.english: The strain of Hantavirus in Shanghai mainly belongs to HTN.
sentences.chinese: 上海地區漢坦病毒以HTN型爲主。
